frontmatter.title: CS 2340 Scala Project: Risk
frontmatter.description: Scala/Play + Vue.js web application providing online Risk, produced for CS 2340 with Professor Simpkins
frontmatter.lead: The frontend is built with Vue.js and HTML Canvases, leveraging the Javascript canvas library Konva, while the backend is built with Play Framework and Akka in Scala. The two sides communicate over a Websocket connection, and the backend features a custom SVG map ingestion pipeline written in Python.
